sourcesContent:
<script>
import { apiService } from "../common/api.service.js";

export default {
  name: "WorkoutPut",
  props: {
    id: {
      type: Number,
      required: false,
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      workout: null,
      part_of_body: null,
      memo: null,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    onSubmit() {
      let endpoint = `/api/workout/${this.id}/`;
      let method = "PUT";
      apiService(endpoint, method, {
        workout: this.workout,
        part_of_body: this.part_of_body,
        memo: this.memo,
      }).then((workout_data) => {
        this.$router.push({
          name: "workout",
          params: { id: workout_data.id },
        });
      });
    },
  },
  async beforeRouteEnter(to, from, next) {
    if (to.params.id !== undefined) {
      let endpoint = `/api/workout/${to.params.id}/`;
      let data = await apiService(endpoint);
      return next((vm) => {
        (vm.workout = data.workout),
          (vm.part_of_body = data.part_of_body),
          (vm.memo = data.memo);
      });
    } else {
      return next();
    }
  },
  created() {
    document.title = "Edit - workout";
  },
};
</script>
